name: Boomeraxe
description:
"It axes and comes backses."

Boomeraxe is a bullet hell dungeon crawler with a unique core mechanic: Your only weapon hurts you too.

Take control of The G'Knight as you dare to escape the cold reaches of Icestralia—a very real place with even realer consequences.Stuff you will find here:
  • Blistering action
  • Synergistic powerups
  • Boss battles
  • Meta progression
  • Questionable zoology
  • Costs about as much as a king-size candy bar (tastes worse)
Stuff you won't find here:
  • Backtracking through rooms you've already cleared
  • Obligatory narrative elements
  • Not fun until you have a good build
  • Exorbitant pricing

Glory awaits! But so does death. Your call.
